department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red face, white nose and mouth and long horns on top of head; raffia around sides of head and chin
marks: Left side, back of mask, in white paint: FX980258
text: The long horns on this mask help to identify it as an animal. It is a representation of the female antelope and was used during Pende healing ceremonies.
title: Mbambi Mask
